org.echo.mobile.framework.facade

Interface InformationFacade

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    EchoFramework
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    EchoFrameworkImpl, InformationFacadeImpl

    public InformationFacade

    Encapsulates logic, associated with receiving blockchain information processes

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void checkAccountReserved(java.lang.String nameOrId, Callback<java.lang.Boolean> callback)
      Checks whether account with nameOrId already exists
      void getAccount(java.lang.String nameOrId, Callback<org.echo.mobile.framework.model.FullAccount> callback)
      Find and returns account with required nameOrId if exists

      Retrieves account history with defining setting parameters
      void getAccountsByWif(java.lang.String wif, Callback<java.util.List> callback)
      Fetches accounts associated with private key in wif format wif

      void getGlobalProperties(Callback<org.echo.mobile.framework.model.GlobalProperties> callback)

    • Method Detail

      • getAccount

        void getAccount(java.lang.String nameOrId,
                Callback<org.echo.mobile.framework.model.FullAccount> callback)

        Find and returns account with required nameOrId if exists

        Parameters:
        nameOrId - Required account name or id
        callback - Listener of operation results. Receives success result only when required account exists

      • getAccountsByWif

        void getAccountsByWif(java.lang.String wif,
                      Callback<java.util.List> callback)

        Fetches accounts associated with private key in wif format wif

        Calls callback's success method with list, contains all received accounts

      • checkAccountReserved

        void checkAccountReserved(java.lang.String nameOrId,
                          Callback<java.lang.Boolean> callback)

        Checks whether account with nameOrId already exists

        Parameters:
        nameOrId - Required account name or id
        callback - Listener of operation results. Retrieves true, if account is available, otherwise false

      • getBalance

        void getBalance(java.lang.String nameOrId,
                java.lang.String asset,
                Callback<org.echo.mobile.framework.model.Balance> callback)

        Gets balance for account with defined nameOrId and specific asset type

        Parameters:
        nameOrId - Required account name or id
        asset - Specific asset type id
        callback - Listener of operation results

      • getAccountHistory

        void getAccountHistory(java.lang.String nameOrId,
                       java.lang.String transactionStartId,
                       java.lang.String transactionStopId,
                       int limit,
                       Callback<org.echo.mobile.framework.model.HistoryResponse> callback)

        Retrieves account history with defining setting parameters

        Parameters:
        nameOrId - Source account name or id
        transactionStartId - ID of the most recent operation to retrieve
        transactionStopId - ID of the earliest operation to retrieve
        limit - Maximum number of operations to retrieve
        callback - Listener of operation results

      • getGlobalProperties

        void getGlobalProperties(Callback<org.echo.mobile.framework.model.GlobalProperties> callback)

        Retrieves blockchain current configuration parameters
